attributes.action: Stop London Underground strikes effecting travel services
attributes.additional_details: Its been going on too long and has to stop.  London Underground workers continue to strike causing massive inconviences to business and commuters in London.  It has continued to happen encouraging them to strike more and more, They need to be stopped and be grateful they have well paid employment!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Authority.
